description.title: Hardhat: transfer ownership and upgrade for transparent proxy
description.purpose:
Executes a single hardhat script to deploy an upgradeable contract via a proxy, and then transfer ownership of that proxy to another user, who then performs the upgrade. Note that the used of @openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable is to allow the storage contract to be initialised with a first value (you can not set directly with proxies).
Skipped due to https://github.com/ten-protocol/ten-internal/issues/3875
